defaultClubs.name: Best Buddies Hawaii
defaultClubs.description: Best Buddies International is a nonprofit 501(c)(3) organization dedicated to establishing a global volunteer movement that creates opportunities for one-to-one friendships

defaultClubs.name: AECT- Hawaii
defaultClubs.description: AECT-Hawaii is a chapter affiliate with the Association for Educational Communications and Technology (AECT). AECT-Hawaii is coordinated by the Department of Learning Design & Technology’s (LTEC) graduate students and is a registered independent organization with the University of Hawaii at Manoa.

defaultClubs.name: Pre-Vet
defaultClubs.description: Club for people wanting to be a veterinarian.

defaultClubs.name: Pre-Med
defaultClubs.description: For people who are interested in the medical field.

defaultClubs.name: Judo
defaultClubs.description: A club for people interested in or want to learn Judo.

defaultRequest.name: Middle Eastern Dance Artists of Hawaii
defaultRequest.description: The Middle Eastern Dance Artists of Hawai’i (MEDAH) is a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization. Founded in 1989 by Dr. Peggy Murphy (Hazzard), MEDAH is the only non-profit group of its kind in Hawai’i devoted to creating and supporting the educational, cultural and entertainment aspects of Middle Eastern dance, music, related cultures and arts.
